name: Paws & Claws: Pet Vet Healing Hands
name_original: Paws & Claws: Pet Vet Healing Hands
description:
Heal with Your Heart & Hands! Let the love in your heart and your skills as a vet guide you as you nurse your pet friends back to health. Nurture them as you grow your pet care business and become every animal’s best friend!

  • Care for 7 adorable animals including horses, kittens, puppies, fawns, lambs & more.
  • Use the Nintendo DS stylus to examine and diagnose over 25 unique cases.
  • Customize your Pet Vet office with 28 accessories – furniture, decor and more.
  • Race through the riding course on your horse and discover a beautiful stream.
  • Nurse your pet friends back to health
